website_summaries.verdict: We understand buying the JBL On Stage for its unique look, but there are better-sounding options available.
pros: The JBL On Stage IV has the look of modern art and offers a practical, portable solution for charging and listening to your iPod or iPhone
cons: In spite of the JBL name and four-driver design, the On Stage sounds anemic for the price

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I got this version when I had to return a newer one because the newer one would shut off when used white noise :( This one can be used for that purpose but I had to use an older ipod instead of my newer phone. I like it and the only thing I would change is the bright light when you put the device on the dock; I have to cover it at night to block out the light. I wish they still made these (without standby feature) for new devices, because as far as I know they are now discontinued. The sound is good for being so small and it's light and portable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reader

customer_reviews.title: Sound Is Exceptionally Good
customer_reviews.text: This is the best iPod dock and speaker setup that I've found. The sound is exceptional. I liked it so much this is the second one I purchased. I have one on the deck and one in the living room. I already had a number of iPods that were going unused and I enjoy making up my own playlists, and the best thing is having such good sound coming from such small units is that I can avoid cluttering my house with furniture size speaker systems.
customer_reviews.author: TxBubba

customer_reviews.title: JBL dissapointment
customer_reviews.text: The remote was poor. I would turn up the volume, & there would be a big delay before finally responding. Sound quality was tiney with little bass. When a song played at a softer level (mostly instrumentally), you could barely hear any sound through the speakers at all. I wouldn't recommend this product. I had it for one day & knew this product did not perform up to it's advertised standards. I actually got it for under $60, which sounds like a good deal, but if it doesn't perform, it's no deal at any price.
customer_reviews.author: treker53

customer_reviews.title: It's JBL need i say more!
customer_reviews.text: Pulled this thing out of the box and WOW! shocked i was,big sound in a small package,easy to operate and get this it's portable so you can take it anywhere(to the beach),it has a small remote that works all my iphone ipod functions,no frills design,power on off at the unit along with audio output and it just looks good,like a piece of art,it's the size of a small candy dish and is sweet to the ears.make sure you adjust the EQ on your iphone to suit your taste,very good find!
customer_reviews.author: Elelyonson

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Dock with Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: I just received my OnStage IV and I am very happy with my purchase. The sound isn't breathtaking, but it isn't a detracting feature (nor are there any detracting features of this product). I wanted to clarify a few things that I thought were nebulous before I purchased it: - The unit does have a bright LED that designates that it is on. However, the unit goes into standby mode automatically after 10 minutes (or 5 minutes on battery power) of no sound input into the speakers. - An iPhone 4 can connect to the dock, even with the Apple Bumper, as long as the removable support is not in place.
customer_reviews.author: John JTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily at work. It keeps the phone charged through out the day and I use it to listen to music. The sound is great in my cubicle. Don't plan on big big sound. You can not mount the iPhone 5 or any iPad on this unit. I also do not believe that adding an iPhone 5 adapter on this unit would work, it would not offer the support that you would need and could cause the unit or adapter to break.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Page

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN I EXPECTED!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is sooo crisp and clear even at the highest volume. Love that I can switch it from different rooms. The style is so cute and it’s the perfect size !
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most other sound docks for ones iPhone, either they are small with poor sound range and volume. Or having to purchase a large, bulky dock that only plugs in with great sound..... This fits the bill, and fulfills both of my wants, a smaller dock thats cool looking and sounds like the larger docks... And even better it plugs i or uses batteries, what can I say....
customer_reviews.author: L. Ressler

customer_reviews.title: amaaaaaazing
customer_reviews.text: Hi OK thank you so much for this amazing speakers everything is great by the way u need aux cable to plugit in the pc and any other phones it can run two deviced at the same time exp: u can plug your iphone and play something then play something from your pc. just 1 thing i whish it had wireless or bluetooh ability then it will be the amazing device with good price thanks
customer_reviews.author: Khalil Malki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for price.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for a small unit. Nice looking. Compact. My only negative is that the on-off button takes a little getting used to; it has to be pushed all the way in and held for a moment to start. This could be an issue with just my unit.
customer_reviews.author: W. S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I selected this unit based on reviews I read on two independent audio equipment sites. I was not disappointed: surprisingly rich, full sound, and easy to use. It's portable enough to move from room to patio to porch, etc., but a little clumsy to include in a suitcase. Considerably larger than the older JBL "doughnut" models, but maybe that's why the sound is so superior. I've only had it for a fe days, so I'm trusting in its longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G. Biscontini

customer_reviews.title: OK for music, great for podcasts and audio books
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the one I bought several years ago that was have the size of this one, but the sound on this one is much better than the little one. OK for music, great for podcasts and audio books.
customer_reviews.author: Fairred

customer_reviews.title: So unusual looking, contemporary design; it's a showpiece ...
customer_reviews.text: So unusual looking, contemporary design; it's a showpiece. The sound is clear and fills the room. I feel very lucky I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Atkisson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3rd generation ipod nano and needed something to charge my ipod as well as play my music. This is just what I was looking for. Sound quality is very good and can be heard in other rooms as well. It comes with a tiny remote which is useless. Otherwise, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: KELCY

customer_reviews.title: I did not think the sound was as great as what some of the reviewers claimed
customer_reviews.text: I did not think the sound was as great as what some of the reviewers claimed. It is fine, or maybe I grew up spoiled with vinyl. But, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: DLF

customer_reviews.title: Just one problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought this iPod dock for my son, and had an opportunity to thy it out on a visit. It sounds terrific and we used it to play background music through Thanksgiving day. The only problem he had was that a docking adapter was not included for his older iPod. He was able to find an after market one for $10 which is working fine.
customer_reviews.author: B. Tinius

customer_reviews.title: Good sound nice shape
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent Ipod docking station. It has good sound for its size, works well on batteries and fills the space well that it is in. Clearly it is not a full blown stereo system - but for the purpose of being portable and flexible for space - good value and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Moshier

customer_reviews.title: Music
customer_reviews.text: Great sound can have it plugged in to charge. Or use batteries to carry around to wherever need. Good price to and if I want I can hook up more speakers for more sound.
customer_reviews.author: Sandyk79

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a small package
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a specific shelf in our kitchen and it has worked incredibly well. Great sound for such a small unit. However, based on the price, and if you use an iPhone, go for the jawbox or another bluetooth unit. You won't have to deal with power cords and new models of apple products, etc.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: 'am a fan, just love it
customer_reviews.text: Appearance is just awesome. At Functional level, they could have added a display to display the sound level that is currently set. No indicator for this :-[ Performance of the unit is good with what has been provided but the remote is weird. At times have to press the keys quite often. Sound quality is very good, after all it's JBL, not too loud. Overall a good unit, but some indicators would have completed it. No Audio cables included with the pack :-[
customer_reviews.author: Binil

customer_reviews.title: S. Anderson  Ft. Collins Colorado
customer_reviews.text: I really like, especially for my old generation Ipod. It has awesome volume when connected to the plug in adapter. I thought they were discontinued....? I wouldn't mind another one for my shop!
customer_reviews.author: Scott C. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker system
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker system, I use it at work every day and the sound/volume was a bonus! I'm glad I found this and bought it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie V218

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I would write that I spent some time toying the idea of purchasing a speaker dock for my iPod Touch. A coworker recommended this system based on his personal experience, and I'm glad that I followed his advice. Bought it few weeks ago and I have used it to play Pandora and my music. Great to be able to move around my apt., listening to great music just few clicks away with the remote control. I love its appearance, sound and portability. Love to take it away with me on weekend getaways. Only regret is that I must be extremely careful when docking it. Besides that, no other issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Velez

customer_reviews.title: not only on the remote - but it works fine and it's super light & compact
customer_reviews.text: I wish some controls were available on the product itself, not only on the remote - but it works fine and it's super light & compact. For the price, a good pick!
customer_reviews.author: Simone Lima

customer_reviews.title: jbl rocks
customer_reviews.text: I am a tried and true Bose fan, however for the small space this unit takes up, the sound is stellar! I use it in my massage practice and if I need it to take with me on an outcall..I can just put it in my table bag...no need for a separate bag like my bose unit! ease of travel and ease of use...perfect! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: sunny afternoon

customer_reviews.title: Love this item!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound,can reach high volumes, easy to use!! It's also very good-looking!! I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from a small package. Is completely compatible with my old iPod and new iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: White Oak Worker

customer_reviews.title: Powerful unit: compact package!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful unit in a compact casing! We use this unit all the time and it gives off great, clear sound. Many hours of enjoyable listening pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Lubliner

customer_reviews.title: I love this docking station
customer_reviews.text: I love this docking station. Sound is great for such a small device. My only issue was with the remote. Very difficult to open the back latch, but once open very easy to remove the battery.
customer_reviews.author: T. Santilli

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good quality. Meets expectations I had. The packaging was adequate and arrived in very good condition The product is good and works properly
customer_reviews.author: Javier Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift and was so impressed with the sound I purchased one for myself. It will charge you iPod and runs off of battery's or power cord. Excellent value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Papa

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dock speaker about 1 month ago. Have been enjoying it every night as bed time music. Using it as overnight charging station for iPhone 4. Works well even with my 8 years old iPod 20GB. Overall sound performance is superb except it is a bit low on bass range. Have not tried to operate at battery mode, but highly recommended for those who looking for good speakers charging dock.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wei

customer_reviews.title: It's alright. Expected more
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good. I was expecting it to be louder for $100. Also, it docks to older apple products. If you are using an older I phone, then it won't fit in docking station if it has a hard cover attached. It would work well with an I pod.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Area Remodel

customer_reviews.title: nice to have
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has great sound and it is space saving. I use it in my kitchen or just move it around the house as I go. love the unique design as well.
customer_reviews.author: D Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from a little device
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from this little dock. Like the versatility of battery, but would be better with built in rechargable battery
customer_reviews.author: Eric Spreeman

customer_reviews.title: Kinda weak...
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have known better because this isn't the first time I purchased a JBL portable speaker. I've always liked their other products, but they just don't seem to be able to make a decent portable speaker. The drivers they use are just too small and sound a bit tinny. They do sound nice and clear and any kind of light, mellow music that uses natural instruments like acoustic guitars will sound pretty great. However, attempting to play any music on this thing that calls for some volume will just distort and sound bad. If you listen to mostly rock or rap, I would look elsewhere. There are definitely better options for the same price or less.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: JBL On Stage IV
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound from this small unit. Portable and great looking. It does have a tendency to "shuffle". The price was less at amazon than other sources I searched. Very fast shipping-2 days. Very Pleased.
customer_reviews.author: rglow

customer_reviews.title: Don't get impressed by the brand
customer_reviews.text: If you intend to filter your purchase options by the brand name, be prepared to a possible surprise. We decided to buy it because it was a JBL, but the performance of that dock is not as big as its brand name. I would say that it will not be so different than a Sony or any other known drand.
customer_reviews.author: Flavio

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Which it had more base but not bad for the price. Must remove my case for pins to attach securely.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Perez

customer_reviews.title: JBL
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting something to play my songs on my Iphone with and not be big and bulky. This is perfect has great sound and is easy to use. I can take it anywhere I want to use it . Good price.
customer_reviews.author: connie putnam

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound from this device is incredible - it will fill even the largest of rooms with crystal clear sound. The fact that it can also run on batteries makes it all the better. Just don't misplace the remote control...
customer_reviews.author: Joshua White

customer_reviews.title: Lack of volume
customer_reviews.text: Im a little disappointed in the volume not being very loud. Other than that everything works fine
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is something I've wanted to get for quite awhile for my iPod but wasn't sure which unit to purchase or how they work. Obviously, I'm not a tech person so appreciated that this was easy to figure out, has wonderful sound quality, and is small enough for my desk at work. I was considering a new radio/CD player because the one I have at work won't get any good stations and the CD player lasted about 6 months at best! (as I said, not a tech person) So this is the perfect solution and I couldn't be happier!!!
customer_reviews.author: ColleenG

customer_reviews.title: I am absolutely satisfied with this docking station
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely satisfied with this docking station. It is easy to use, portable and has a remote. The sound is the best and the volume the highest of 3 that I tried. I would recommend the purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Estes

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I don't need a refund now I bought an adapter
customer_reviews.author: Valery Richards

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: It works well... But it has a light that stays on all the time... I would like to turn on /off. So I could leave the speakers on all night and use the speaker with iPhone alarm. The sound is very good but I would like a little bit more power. In general design and performance are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Ulises Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: great sound in a compact package
customer_reviews.text: tremendous sound, fills the room it is in, no complaints other than the very small remote, very easy to misplace
customer_reviews.author: Bluesmgb

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good at mid-high volume. I expected deeper bass at low volume. But it's ok fot the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Bustos Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i use in my desk while work listening my music, i can use the radio of my ipod nano so i can listen the news to. work very well inclusive unpluged (batteries operation) indoor. not recomended for outdoor it only can be hear at 6 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: armiro

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and appearance, especially for such a compact device
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use as well. I researched quite a few before settling on this, and I am completely satisfied with purchase. I use it for i-phone4S to play music and charge phone, it lives on kitchen bar without taking up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, JBL really does make some great products. Great service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought myself a Christmas Gift Outstanding sound.. Shipped on time
customer_reviews.author: jerry jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be more pleased with the sound quality of this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Washoe1

customer_reviews.title: It was everything i expected, a very good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I love the JBL product for it's great sound, ease of operation and compact size. It delivers a great sound at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Meirowsky

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Sound!!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker dock has Incredible Sound quality!!!! Very happy with how simple it is to use. The price was very reasonable. I would recommend this product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Value for money and performance for size
customer_reviews.text: A great device for 99$, fills a standard room with sound. Great on all the notes. To maintain aesthetics, there are few buttons on the device - so dont lose the tiny remote !
customer_reviews.author: Shy

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if these dockers are made for the older model iPods, but on the newer ones the sound quality is great even though it is a small unit, it still kicks out the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Mason

customer_reviews.title: very practical
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed, for use with an iPod or iPhone makes the product very useful in any event. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Barbosa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but a little behind the times
customer_reviews.text: I had bad timing when buying this, because I got right before the iPhone 5 came out, and they changed the connector for apple products. However, the sound quality is amazing, especially for the size and the price. I still use it all the time with my phone, just make sure you buy an auxiliary cable (they're cheap and easy to find). The remote is also handy.
customer_reviews.author: Your face

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly built.
customer_reviews.text: Not good with the price comparing to the quality of this product. Very generic/mediocre sound. Go with a Bose instead.
customer_reviews.author: BNV

customer_reviews.title: JBL On Stage IV Portable Loudspeaker Dock for ipod
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker. The music is so clear. I purchased this for my husband and he loves it. Small enough to travel with. It works great with his 7 Gen ipod.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't provide great sound. I was disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Didn't provide great sound. I was disappointed. I actually just gave it to a friend because I didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Better music inside a soup can. Don't bother with this.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Mountain

customer_reviews.title: "ON" Button Failed after 6 Months!
customer_reviews.text: Worked OK when first arrived, but after six months of very little use, the on button won't stay on. Goes off immediately and will not stay in the "ON" position.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Walker

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like a cheap alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: This is the first negative review i have ever taken the time to write in my life! Wish I would've read reviews before purchasing this. The JBL IV sounds like a toy. It charges my 4s when I plug it in BUT so does the 50$ dock that I picked up at radio shack 5 years ago that sounds a hundred times better. Don't waste your money on this one unless you want to use it as an annoying alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but it doesn't charge your iPhone properly.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound but I don't know mine came with a problem because it doesn't charge the iPhone. When you ran out of battery you need to stop listening and charge your iPhone somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: Sound is very good.
customer_reviews.text: The remote is not very responsive at all. Sound is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality on device is terrible. You get better sound playing music through headphones. I thought JBL would have better quality, but I was very disappointed with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: This product does not fit my iPhone 6 Plus. ...
customer_reviews.text: This product does not fit my iPhone 6 Plus. I thought it did, but I orderd the right one. I should be getting it today.
customer_reviews.author: Larry McKee

customer_reviews.title: JBL On stage IV
customer_reviews.text: Did not work with my ITouch 4 so sent back. Ended up with a logitech rechargable. Works with my unit and is more versitile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: JBL OnStage IV 30-Pin iPod/iPhone Speaker Dock
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingIf power and portability are what you want in a loudspeaker dock, the JBL On Stage* IV has them – in style. Four JBL Odyssey full-range transducers and a digital amplifier will fill virtually any room (or outdoor space, for that matter) with realistic JBL sound, and six AA batteries will give you hours of continuous use. The IR remote control lets you navigate your music library from across the room, and a USB cable will sync your iPod or iPhone with iTunes and keep it charged. So anywhere you and your friends get together, you’ll want the JBL On Stage IV to be there, too.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


SHARE YOUR MUSIC
If power and portability are what you want in a loudspeaker dock, the JBL On Stage® IV has them - in style. Four JBL® Odyssey® full-range transducers will flood virtually any room (or outdoor space, for that matter) with realistic JBL sound, and six AA batteries will give you hours of continuous use. The IR remote control lets you navigate your music library from across the room, and a USB cable will sync and charge your iPod or iPhone device when connected to the iTunes Web site. So anywhere you and your friends get together, you'll want the JBL On Stage IV to be there too.

JBL has been bringing the sound of music and movies home for more than 60 years. THE SOUND OF MUSIC AND MOVIES FOR MORE THAN 60 YEARS
Been to a movie or a concert recently? There's a good chance that you were enjoying the show on JBL loudspeakers. If you've watched TV or downloaded your favorite song, what you listened to was more than likely recorded on JBL equipment. For more than 60 years, the JBL line has been the loudspeaker brand of choice for music and movie professionals around the world. They choose this brand because they can count on the brand's incredible sound quality to bring life to their latest music track or movie score. So why not enjoy music and movies from your iPod, iPhone or portable music device on a loudspeaker dock from the company that probably helped to mix and master them?



Advanced Odyssey transducers deliver audiophile sound quality Click here to View Larger SUPERIOR SOUND QUALITY
JBL ODYSSEY TRANSDUCERS
The JBL On Stage IV delivers superior sound quality through the use of four proprietary Odyssey transducers. The sound quality of these four drivers has been further improved with computer-optimized equalization, which tunes their output specifically for the JBL On Stage IV. These drivers are able to deliver incredible full-range sound (70Hz - 20kHz) because they are made of aluminum, which is the perfect driver material for wide dynamic range since it is incredibly rigid yet very lightweight. With the JBL On Stage IV, you'll be surprised by just how good a JBL loudspeaker dock can sound.

POWERFUL DIGITAL POWER AND DSP
The JBL On Stage IV features a powerfully tuned digital audio path. The clean digital amplification delivers high-output, crystal-clear sound.

COMPLETE COMPATIBILITY
With the JBL On Stage IV, you can use nearly any portable or desktop device.

IPOD- AND IPHONE-COMPATIBLE
Use your iPod or iPhone to listen to music, watch videos or check out your photos. It is compatible with all docking versions of the iPod, including the iPod nano G3, iPod classic and the iPod touch. The JBL On Stage IV is also compatible with all versions of the iPhone, including the recently released iPhone 4.0. And when using your iPhone with the JBL On Stage IV, you can still receive calls even while you're listening to music. The JBL On Stage IV will interrupt your music to let you take your call and then seamlessly go back to playing your tunes when you are done.

USB and auxilliary inputs allow you to connect the On Stage IV to nearly any portable device. Click here to View Larger USB INPUT
The JBL On Stage IV even has a USB input, allowing you to easily connect to iTunes to sync your latest favorite music to your iPod or iPhone - all without having to remove it from the dock.

AUXILLIARY INPUT
And with the included auxilliary input, you can also connect the JBL On Stage IV to a number of other "non-Apple" devices, such as other mobile phones, CD players, and desktop and laptop computers (all platforms). 


DYNAMIC DESIGN
NEW JBL WEAVE DESIGN
Featuring the dynamic new Weave design, the JBL On Stage IV looks as good as it sounds: It's sculpted with swooping high-gloss pieces along with a dramatic see-through cradle that is backlit. You'll be sure to stand out from the crowd. 

SIMPLE TO USE
EASY TO USE CONTROLS
Just a touch of the brushed metal touch controls increases or decreases the volume.

The included wireless remote control gives you complete control of your iPod or iPhone WIRELESS IR REMOTE
Using the included IR remote control, you can browse iPod or iPhone songs, photos and playlists; change tracks and settings; and much more.

EVERCHARGE TOPOLOGY
When plugged into AC power, the JBL On Stage IV will charge your iPod or iPhone, even when it isn't connected to the computer or if the system is off. And when you want to take the JBL On Stage IV on the go, six AA batteries will give you up to 16 hours of playback.






HIGHLIGHTS
 

Dynamic new JBL Weave design Compact, lightweight and portable Battery-operated IR remote control navigates iPod and iPhone menus from up to 15 feet (4.6 meters) away Up to 16 hours of music playback from a fresh set of batteries Easy-to-use touch controls AC power supply charges iPod/iPhone devices USB input allows sync to iTunes Battery and energy conservation modes Status LED light 

Click here to View On Stage IV Product Sheet 



WHAT'S IN THE BOX
One JBL On Stage IV portable loudspeaker dock, one power supply, one mini cable, iPod/iPhone adapters









WHICH DOCK IS RIGHT FOR YOU?

Click here for the On Stage Micro II 
 ON STAGE MICRO II 
Smaller than the On Stage IV, the On Stage Micro II still delivers powerful JBL sound from a classic design.






Click here for the On Stage IIIP  ON STAGE IIIP 
Similar to the On Stage IV, the JBL On Stage IIIP produces clear, powerful sound from a classic JBL design.





Click here for the On Time 200P  ON TIME 200P
Looking to wake up to the sound of your iPod? Check out the On Time 200P which adds alarm clock and radio functionality to great JBL sound quality



Click here for the On Time Micro  ON TIME MICRO
Looking to wake up to the sound of your iPod? The On Time Micro does it with style. The On Time Micro adds an alarm clock and radio functionality along with the ability to set seven independent alarms to the already great JBL sound quality of the On Stage IV.
feature_bullets: AC or battery operated (batteries not included)
Four JBL Odyssey transducers with computer-optimized equalization
IR remote control navigates iPod menus from 15 ft (4.6m) away
